paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant p.Glu82Lys, including penetrance data and patient details.

individual_records.phenotype_details: presented signs and symptoms of angina pectoris and dyspnoea; positive history for hypertension
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In our case, the patient was a 56-year-old woman with HCM of unknown significance, no history of neurological or cardiological disorders, who presented signs and symptoms of angina pectoris and dyspnoea.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with hereditary amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The mutation was confirmed by Sanger sequencing.
key_quotes: We detected amyloidogenic mutation (p.Glu82Lys) c.243G>A in TTR gene in one sample.
The mutation was proven by Sanger sequencing.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is comprehensive based on the available information in the paper.
